name: AxiDraw
description: Pen plotter from Evil Mad Scientist, very popular on #plottertwitter.

name: Line-us
description: A cute little kickstarted robotic drawing arm.

name: Makeblock XY Plotter
description: Hackable XY plotter kit (discontinued?).

name: Drawing Robot
description: 3d-Printable AxiDraw clone w/ Arduino CNC Shield controller running grbl firmware.

name: WaterColorBot
description: XY art robot and software to plot with watercolor paints.

name: EggBot
description: Pen plotter for egg-shaped and spherical objects.

name: HP Pen Plotters
description: Vintage desktop and floor-standing pen plotters from the creator of the HPGL standard. Model 7475A is very common and can usually be found on eBay.

name: Roland Pen Plotters
description: Vintage flatbed HPGL pen plotters. Search eBay for "roland dxy".

name: Polargraph
description: The original polargraph hardware and software project.

name: Makelangelo
description: Open source polargraph artbot.

name: grblShield
description: All the stepper motor control hardware needed to turn an Arduino into a G-code-based motion controller using the grbl firmware. (adafruit)

name: TinyG
description: More featureful and robust 6-axis G-code-based motion control hardware. (adafruit)

name: Arduino CNC Shield
description: Grbl-compatible stepper motor control shield for Arduino, similar to the grblShield.

name: Raspberry Pi CNC Hat
description: Raspberry Pi add-on board w/ stepper controllers and a microcontroller running grbl. Interfaces with the Pi's serial pins.

name: WiFi232
description: Wifi to RS-232 serial via a DB25 plug. Control your serial plotter wirelessly.

name: Plotter Cable Pinout
description: Schematic for a plotter cable that will work for most HP and Roland plotters. Search eBay or Amazon for DB9 to DB25 Serial Null Modem Cable or similar to find them for sale.

name: Sharpie Fine Point Plotter Adapter
description: 3d-printed adapter to fit a standard Sharpie in an HP-GL plotter.

name: Parametric 3d-Printable Plotter Pen Adapter
description: Adjustable model to print adapters for various pens.

name: Plotter Pen STL Models
description: Accurate STL models of both short and long standard plotter pens.

name: Pens for AxiDraw
description: List of pens suitable for general plotter abuse.

name: Pens for EggBot
description: Egg- and glass-focused pen recommendations but still generally applicable information.

name: Chiplotle
description: Python library for generating HPGL and interfacing with serial plotters.

name: HPGL Reference Guide
description: HTML-based HPGL Reference.

name: HP 7475A Interfacing and Programming Manual
description: Scanned PDF manual that contains a full HPGL reference.

name: djipco/hpgl
description: A Node.js library to communicate with HPGL-compatible plotters and printers.

name: hp2xx
description: GNU tool to convert HPGL into other vector and raster formats. Can also be used as a previewing in X11.

name: vec
description: Example C code for generating HPGL, with a turtle graphics interface.

name: d3-hpgl
description: An adapter for the HTML Canvas API so you can output HPGL using the popular D3 library.

name: HPGL Viewer
description: An HPGL Viewer using JavaScript and HTML5 canvas.

name: HPGL Sender
description: A web interface for previewing HPGL and sending it to your plotter.

name: grbl
description: A high-performance G-code interpreting firmware for the Atmega 328 microcontroller and Arduino.

name: cncjs
description: A web-based interface controlling CNC machines running grbl, TinyG, or other G-code-based firmware.

name: node-gcode
description: Node.js-based G-code interpreter and simulator.

name: svg2gcode
description: Node.js-based command line utility for converting SVG to G-code.

name: svg2gcode
description: Python-based utility for fast SVG to G-code conversion.

name: jscut
description: A web-based utiltity for converting SVG to G-code.

name: Universal-G-Code-Sender
description: Java-based grbl-compatible cross-platform G-code sender.

name: ChiliPeppr Hardware Fiddle
description: Modular web-based workspaces to visualize G-code and control hardware.

name: axidraw
description: Official AxiDraw extensions for Inkscape.

name: axi
description: Unofficial Python library for the AxiDraw v3.

name: xy
description: Utilities for the Makeblock XY Plotter Robot Kit.

name: LaserGRBL
description: Laser-optimized Windows GUI for grbl controllers. Could be repurposed for DIY pen plotters that use a solenoid for pen up/down movements.

name: Line-us Inkscape Plugin
description: Sends drawings to the Line-us plotter directly from Inkscape.

name: Line-us API Examples
description: Example code for the Line-us plotter's G-code-based API.

name: @beardicus/line-us
description: JavaScript library for controlling the Line-us machine from Node or the browser.

name: PenPlotter
description: Polargraph controller that uses repetier firmware.

name: Makelangelo-firmware
description: Firmware for the Makelangelo polargraph robot.

name: RoboPaint
description: Software for the WaterColorBot.

name: AxiTurtle
description: Turtle graphics for AxiDraw in Processing.

name: GRBL-Plotter
description: Plotter-optimized Windows GUI for grbl controller with SVG and DXF import, and flexible pen up/down control.

name: saxi
description: Driver and library for the AxiDraw. Uses constant-acceleration motion planning and automatically resizes to paper.

name: Inkscape
description: Popular cross-platform open source vector graphics editor.

name: p5.js
description: "JavaScript library that makes coding accessible for artists, designers, educators, and beginners".

name: Paper.js
description: "The Swiss Army Knife of Vector Graphics Scripting".

name: ln
description: Vector-based 3D renderer written in Go.

name: autotrace
description: Converts bitmap images to vector graphics.

name: stipplegen
description: Creates interesting stippled drawings from bitmap images. (blog post)

name: SquiggleDraw
description: "SquiggleDraw will create a SVG file from an image, using the brightness to change the amplitude of sine waves".

name: svgurt
description: Web-based PNG to SVG creative noodler.

name: maptrace
description: Produce watertight polygonal vector maps by tracing raster images.

name: Drawbot_image_to_gcode_v2
description: Creates G-code for use on drawbots.

name: blackstripes
description: Turns a PNG image into a SVG line drawing.

name: Ribbon
description: Ribbon diagrams of proteins in written in Go.

name: penplot
description: A development environment for plotter art in JavaScript.

name: penkit
description: A Python library for creating line-based SVG graphics.

name: generativeExamples
description: Example Processing code that generates plottable PDFs.

name: Let's make map
description: Web-based tool to export an SVG map from Mapzen tiles.

name: SuperformulaSVG for web
description: A generative line art web app.

name: scribbleplot
description: Scribbly image transformations in Processing.

name: Maker.js
description: Library for creating 2D vector drawings for CNC and laser cutter machines.

name: Turtletoy
description: Browser-based JavaScript turtle graphics API with SVG export.

name: svgsort
description: Path planning for plotting SVG files, reduces time spent moving with the pen up.

name: svgo
description: Node.js-based tool for optimizing SVG files.

name: Polargraph Optimizer
description: Optimize drawing plan for a polargraph.

name: penkit-optimize
description: An SVG optimizer that uses a vehicle routing solver to minimize plot time.

name: svg-crowbar
description: Chrome-only bookmarklet for extracting SVG from an HTML document.

name: Summary of single line fonts
description: Good information and links to other resources and fonts.

name: Hershey Vector Font
description: .fnt format of vector fonts from the 60s. Includes a good overview of the original data format of the fonts.

name: hershey-fonts
description: C library and original font data for the Hershey fonts.

name: OneLineFonts.com
description: Commercial site with some single-line fonts available for purchase.

name: An Intro to Pen Plotters
description: Good info on getting started with old HPGL plotters.

name: 1980s pen plotters of the future
description: Another intro to vintage pen plotters.

name: Pen Plotter Programming: The Basics
description: Some basics of programming vector paths, including sorting, joining, and simplifying.

name: On Generative Algorithms
description: Nice 13-part walkthrough of interesting algorithms.

name: Roland DG DXY-990
description: Quickstart guide for a Roland flatbed plotter.

name: The Cohen-Sutherland Line Clipping Algorithm
description: Detailed explanation and examples of an interesting algorithm.

name: Vera Moln√°r
description: OG plotter artist.

name: The Recode Project
description: "The ReCode Project is a community-driven effort to preserve computer art by translating it into a modern programming language".

name: Hektor
description: The original cable-based drawbot from 2002.

name: Pen Plotter Art & Algorithms
description: A two-part intro to creating generative graphics for plotting.

name: Surface Projection
description: Some projection techniques for creating line graphics suitable for plotting.

name: Fractal Generation with L-Systems
description: Techniques for creating line-based fractal graphics.

name: Pen Plotter Art & Algorithms
description: Introduction to plotters, AxiDraw, walkthrough of the penplot library.

name: Surface Projection
description: Deep dive into surface projection and hidden line removal using Python and penplot.

name: Introduction to TSP art
description: Resources for traveling salesman problem (single path) art.

name: Hidden wireframe removal
description: Discussion and links to code for wireframe removal of STL files.

name: #plottertwitter
description: Twitter hashtag with lots o' plots.

name: Chiplotle-discuss
description: Fairly inactive mailing list for the Chiplotle HPGL Python library with some general plotter talk.

name: Customized Streetart
description: Customizable maps with optional pen plotter output.
